channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Americans convicted in Congo of a botched coup attempt now face US charges
item.description: Three Americans repatriated to the United States from Congo have been charged by the U.S. Justice Department with staging an elaborate coup attempt aimed at overthrowing the African nation’s government.

item.title: A California soccer coach charged in a 13-year-old’s death is accused of assaulting other teens
Hearing looks at rules for evidence and other details in Bryan Kohberger’s quadruple murder trial
